metadata.title: CVE-2021-28302 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack overflow in pupnp before version 1.14.5 can cause the denial of service through the Parser_parseDocument() function. ixmlNode_free() will release a child node recursively, which will consume stack space and lead to a crash.

criterions.comment: pupnp-1.8 package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
